lead_paragraph: May Taylor Doherty, a reader evacuated from Vietnam as a child in 1975 at the end of the American involvement, writes that while she is proud of her heritage, she is grateful to be an American.

headline.main: Out of Vietnam: Adoptee Grateful to Be an American
headline.print_headline: Out of Vietnam: Adoptee Grateful to Be an American

snippet: May Taylor Doherty, a reader evacuated from Vietnam as a child in 1975 at the end of the American involvement, writes that while she is proud of her heritage, she is grateful to be an American.
